From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia




2023 Indian filmRabia and OliviaPoster of movie Rabia & OliviaDirected byShadab KhanScreenplay byShadab KhanStory byShadab KhanProduced byYousef SheikhStarringSheeba ChadhaHelena Prizen KlagueMustafa SheikhShadab KhanCinematographyLenod KoganPankaj KachuaEdited byPrashant PandaMusic byRipul SharmaProductioncompanySynchron EntertainmentDistributed byDisney+ HotstarRelease date
24 February 2023 (2023-02-24)
Running time124 minutesCountryIndiaLanguageHindi
Rabia and Olivia is a 2023 Indian Hinglish-language Drama film written and directed by Shadab Khan.[1] The film starring Sheeba Chaddha,[2] Nayab Khan, Helena Prizen Klague, Mustafa Sheikh, Shadab Khan.[3]


Production[edit]
The drama film is produced under the banner of Synchron Entertainment,produced by Yousef Sheikh,[4] co-produced by Tamara Gazzaz. The film is directed, story, screenplay and dialogue by Shadab Khan.The producer Yousef Sheikh has also given the screenplay and dialogue in the film.Music and lyrics are given by Ripul Sharma and background score by Jeorge Joseph. The film has been shot in Toronto, Mumbai and Aurangabad.

Plot[edit]
Rabia and Olivia is a story of how the bond between a child and her care-taker grows into a bond of mother and daughter and how there is drastic change in the behaviour of Olivia under the Rabiya's care.[5] But due to some unthoughtful events, Rabiya was arrested and there start an online campaign in the justice of Rabiya.
Due to the intensity and fire in their efforts, more and more people join them in support of their noble mission. Ultimately, on the grounds of humanity, media, politicians and common people join in the form of a humanity and made Rabiya meet Olivia.[6]

Cast[edit]
Nayab Khan as Rabia
Helena Prinzen Klague as Olivia
Sheeba Chaddha[7] as Rabiya's Mother
Mustafa Sheikh as Moosa
Afroz Khan as Naser Bhai
Shadab Khan as Ishaan
Nathan Bragg as Mark
Reception[edit]
The film Rabia and Olivia received overwhelming reviews . Ronak Kotecha of Times of India has given three star and quoted it as universal story.[8]  Subuddhi Prajapti of OTT Play has also given three star and written that it is a beautiful story.[9] Media house like Movies talkies,[10] Latestly and Navbharat also have given good reviews.
Although the film does not have  any big names but the story and the performance of the casts have made it an outstanding film and made it to gather positive reviews.
